DOC.brief_title: A Study Safety Effectiveness Different Doses 1592U89 HIV-Infected Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize receive one three dose 1592U89 . During randomized dose phase , patient meet one follow criterion , he/she offer open-label 1592U89 ( 300 mg ) plus zidovudine ( ZDV ) plus lamivudine ( 3TC ) ( license antiretrovirals accord standard practice ) . Criteria base fall CD4 count ( return baseline two occasion least 1 month apart ) , disease progression ( define occurrence new AIDS-defining event accord CDC classification exclude CD4 count less 200 cells/mm3 ) , lack virus suppression ( define less 0.7log10 reduction viral load Week 4 repeat value 1 week later , 5000 copies/ml HIV RNA Weeks 12 , 16 , 20 , 24 , 5000 copies/ml anytime Week 24 ) .
